alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 10:25PM AKST until November 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...PASSING FRONT TO BRING SNOW TO NORTHERN LYNN CANAL... .Northerly winds ahead of a gale force front will bring in below freezing temperatures to the northern panhandle on Wednesday. Wednesday afternoon, the associated front will bring moisture to the panhandle that will last into Thursday. As this moisture collides with the cold air in the north, snow is likely. For the highway and higher elevations near Haines, heavy snow up to 6 inches is expected over a 12 to 15 hour time frame. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
